definition: to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out

sentences.chinese: 实体基础设施和能源行业。

sentences.english: This has happened even in developing-world countries with far less infrastructure than Japan has.
sentences.chinese: 这甚至在基础设施远不如日本的发展中国家也是如此。

sentences.english: We believe that urban infrastructure should be more comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为，城市基础设施建设应使人更加舒适。

sentences.english: Bihar’s public services and infrastructure are among the worst in India.
sentences.chinese: 比哈尔邦的公共服务和基础设施位居印度最差行列。

sentences.english: Grid provides an infrastructure that you turn it on and off as needed.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据需要打开和关闭网格提供的基础设施。

sentences.english: Strengthen BASIC infrastructure construction and improve the hard investment environment.
sentences.chinese: 加强基础设施建设，努力改善外商投资的“硬环境”。

sentences.english: At the moment even the most basic infrastructure is lacking.
sentences.chinese: 但现在这两个地方连最基本的基础设施还不具备。

sentences.english: During this time, Augustus improved the infrastructure and military of Rome.
sentences.chinese: 在他的领导下，罗马城的基础设施和军队得到了改善。

sentences.english: After all, these enterprises often have made large investments in an infrastructure that is only compatible with IE.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，这些企业的很多基础设施投入只能和IE兼容。

sentences.english: We won’t be safe if we can’t count on our infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们不依靠基础设施建设，我们将毫无安全可言。

sentences.english: "China invests a lot in infrastructure, " Sen says.
sentences.chinese: “中国人在基础设施上投资很多，”森说。

sentences.english: The pre-wired, location aware, infrastructure makes change simple.
sentences.chinese: 前有线，位置清楚，基础设施作出改变简单。

sentences.english: The development of infrastructure to solve bottlenecks, the establishment of a multi-modal transportation center.
sentences.chinese: 发展基础设施，解决瓶颈问题，建立多式运输中心。

sentences.english: BladeSystem presents a hierarchical and interrelated infrastructure to the management console.
sentences.chinese: 刀片提出了层次和相互关联的基础设施的管理控制台。

sentences.english: Highway construction as national basic facilities construction developes quickly.
sentences.chinese: 公路建设作为国家基础设施建设发展迅速。

definition: public utility/state-run enterprise/public foundation or enterprise, often charitable
